name: Russell Creek
description:
Oregon prospect near Mt. Jefferson. Unfortunately, this area was overrun in the wildfires of 2020. This creek is glacial-fed.

Cover photo is taken from the PCT pre-fire.

Approach

Descent

Per lidar, there are at least three rappels in the canyon.

  • R1:
  • R2: ~130ft ?
  • R3: Lower Russell Falls 40ft?

Exit

Red tape

Visitors to the Mt. Jefferson Wilderness require a Central Cascades Wilderness Permit for all overnight use and some day-use between June 15 and Oct. 15.
